lead_paragraph: Frank McCourt, former owner of the Los Angeles Dodgers baseball team, said on Monday he had entered exclusive negotiations to buy Olympique de Marseille and vowed to restore the club to their former glories.

headline.print_headline: Former LA Dodgers Owner McCourt to Buy Marseille
headline.main: Former LA Dodgers Owner McCourt to Buy Marseille
